description: Made for the backcountry, these hardshell pants are the stuff of freeriding dreams: They’re extremely breathable and ultra-lightweight. Featuring a Pertex Shield Air membrane, these waterproof pants fuse great weather protection with impressive breathability. Side zippers offer great ventilation. A relaxed, freeride-inspired cut ensures full freedom of movement with a casual style.
name: Mammut Haldigrat Air HS Pants, Short - Mens
